title: Memory not released when tabs are closed 94.0.2

title: Instagram will not load using Firefox
content: With the latest Firefox 94.0.2, Instagram will not load. All I get is the Instagram camera graphic in the middle of the screen and nothing else on the screen. I've tried refresh and I've cleared Instagram cookies. This has not helped. FYI - I have NO PROBLEM getting to my Instagram account using Safari browser from Apple!
creator: retpgmr
